title: An Off-Duty Policeman: Episode 224
description:
Do you remember July 2012, the London Olympics, long summer days and a feeling of the UK coming together. PC Ian Dibell, from Clacton on the east coast of Essex was not at work when he heard a disturbance in the road where he lived.

In this episode of the UK True Crime podcast, I describe what happened next......
